name: Mario Mania Series Part 3
description: WOW! This is the outstanding new Mario fangame. It's called Mario Mania The Mysterious Islands. It's made with FDEngine Exi Source. It's Powered with FDEngine Exi Source. It's Powered by Super Mario Bros: The Mysterious Islandz. It's Powered by Mysterious Islandz. It's Powered by Mysterious Islands. It's made by Me, MajorGeniePonyGirl and the ASE Team. It is Inspired by two SMW Hacks. It is Inspired by the two SMW Hacks. It is Inspired by 2 SMW Hacks. It is Inspired by known as Unknown Islandz and Kaos Islands, respectively made by xIque. I have my own ideas for the advancement of this game. Here are some screenies below. This is the last part of the Mario Mania Series. There's Mario Mania The Mysterious Islands.
